title: How to link Zigbee devices to the Amazon Echo
content:
When it comes to controlling a smart home with an Amazon Echo, the first thought is using Alexa. Besides being the voice of the Echo, the Alexa platform contains support for an absurd quantity of smart home hardware. If it’s connected, there’s a pretty good chance it’s connected to Alexa.
